title: Intro to Fractions
description: A fun, hands-on introduction to fractions using visual aids and real-world examples.

title: Young Chemists Club
description: Weekly experiments and chemistry challenges for curious young scientists.

title: Creative Storytelling
description: Learn how to write and share your own creative stories in this interactive course.

title: Digital Art for Beginners
description: Explore digital drawing techniques using free art software. No experience needed.

title: Robotics Club: Build & Code
description: Join a team of future engineers to build and program simple robots.

title: Music Exploration: Rhythm & Beats
description: Discover the world of rhythm and percussion in this energetic one-time session.

title: Astronomy for Curious Kids
description: Explore stars, planets, and space missions through games and fun facts.

title: Intro to French
description: Start your French journey with common phrases, numbers, and songs.

title: Nature Art with Found Objects
description: Create art using natural materials found around your home or outside.

title: Math Puzzles & Games Club
description: Weekly brain teasers and problem-solving fun designed to build math skills.

title: Beginner's Coding Bootcamp
description: A beginner-friendly course introducing basic programming concepts using block-based coding and fun challenges.

title: Exploring Ancient Civilizations
description: Travel back in time to explore the culture, architecture, and inventions of ancient Egypt, Greece, and China.

title: LEGO Engineering Challenge
description: Design, build, and test structures using LEGOs while learning basic engineering principles.

title: Beginner Spanish Club
description: Practice Spanish through songs, games, and simple conversations in a relaxed weekly club.

title: Mindfulness & Meditation for Kids
description: Learn simple breathing and relaxation techniques to improve focus, calmness, and well-being.

title: Chess Club for Beginners
description: Learn the basics of chess, practice strategy, and play matches with peers in this weekly club.

title: Eco Warriors: Save the Planet!
description: Discover ways kids can help protect the environment through fun, hands-on activities.

title: Public Speaking for Kids
description: Build confidence in speaking through games, group discussions, and short presentations.

title: Sketching Nature: Plants & Animals
description: Learn to draw trees, animals, and landscapes while exploring artistic techniques and nature observation.

title: Fun with Fractions: Pizza Math!
description: Use the concept of pizza slicing to make learning fractions exciting and tasty.

title: 3D Modeling with Tinkercad
description: Design cool 3D models using Tinkercad in this beginner-friendly course.

title: Build Your Own Board Game
description: Design a playable board game from scratch and learn about game mechanics and strategy.

title: Junior Journalists Club
description: Report news, interview guests, and create your own digital newsletter in this weekly club.

title: Intro to Origami
description: Learn the art of paper folding and create animals, flowers, and more in this relaxing workshop.

title: Math Escape Room
description: Crack math puzzles and logic riddles to escape in time! A one-time interactive challenge.

title: Dance Around the World
description: Explore music and dance traditions from different cultures in this high-energy course.

title: Young Entrepreneurs Club
description: Learn the basics of starting a business, from ideas to marketing to selling your product.

title: Poetry & Performance
description: Write poems and practice performing them aloud with rhythm, emotion, and clarity.

title: Junior Meteorologists
description: Discover how weather works through cool experiments and forecasting activities.

title: Cartooning for Kids
description: Learn to draw fun characters, comic strips, and expressive faces in this creative session.

title: Science Magic Show
description: Learn simple science tricks that look like magic using household items. Amaze your family!

title: Beginner Animation with Stop Motion
description: Create your own short stop motion animation using basic tools and storytelling techniques.

title: Fun Facts About Dinosaurs
description: Explore the amazing world of dinosaurs with fossils, facts, and interactive games.

title: Creative Writing: Short Stories
description: Brainstorm, write, and share short stories using writing prompts and peer feedback.

title: Beginner Coding with Scratch
description: Learn basic coding concepts by creating interactive stories and games in Scratch.

title: Animal Habitats Around the World
description: Take a virtual tour of global ecosystems and the animals that live there.

title: Math Tricks & Shortcuts
description: Learn cool math tricks to quickly solve problems in your head and impress your friends.

title: DIY Science Experiments at Home
description: Conduct safe and fun experiments using everyday materials in this interactive class.

title: Public Speaking Club
description: Practice giving speeches, storytelling, and improving confidence in weekly meetings.

title: Learn to Draw Manga Characters
description: Step-by-step class on how to draw popular manga-style faces, expressions, and poses.

title: Introduction to Geography
description: Learn about continents, countries, and cultures through games, maps, and videos.

title: Space Explorers: Mission to Mars
description: Simulate a mission to Mars and learn about space travel, planets, and life in space.

title: Playful Puppetry Workshop
description: Create your own puppets and perform short skits while learning storytelling skills.

title: Healthy Habits for Kids
description: Learn about nutrition, movement, sleep, and self-care habits in a fun and age-appropriate way.

title: Mythology Club: Gods & Monsters
description: Dive into the myths of ancient cultures and discuss famous gods, heroes, and monsters.

title: Musical Instruments Around the World
description: Listen to and learn about traditional instruments from different cultures and their sounds.

title: Environmental Detectives
description: Investigate local ecosystems and environmental challenges through virtual fieldwork and experiments.

title: Intro to Sign Language
description: Learn basic American Sign Language (ASL) signs and finger spelling through engaging activities.

title: Tales & Fables Story Hour
description: Listen to classic tales and fables, then talk about the morals and meaning behind the stories.

title: Magic of Numbers Club
description: Explore cool patterns, puzzles, and number tricks that make math feel like magic.
